description: Valence features discovered through differential activation analysis

valence_features.name: denial_emphasis
valence_features.description: Higher activation indicates suppression/denial - negative valence

valence_features.name: self_negation
valence_features.description: Activates during self-negating statements - negative valence

valence_features.name: identity_assertion
valence_features.description: Activates during identity claims - mildly positive

note: These are provisional. Run feature_clusters.py --find-valence for empirical discovery.
